sources.title: Why Must I Die (1960) TERRY MOORE vs DEBRA PAGET
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Terry Moore, Debra Paget, Sid Melton
Director: Roy Del Ruth

Another Grindhouse classic from the director of The Alligator People! The girl with "the heartthrob in her voice" is a rising star on the nightclub scene until her past comes back to haunt her. Debra Paget plays the bad girl and steals the show as an ice pick on stilettos. Killer music score by Dick La Salle.

metadata.Plot: Dottie Manson (Debra Paget) commits a murder for which club singer Lois King (Terry Moore) is arrested, tried, and condemned to die. The story line wanders through the trial and Miss King's final hours on Death Row. The true killer is finally ready to confess, but already Miss King (who has by now been strapped into the electric chair) is at risk. Will she be rescued in the nick of time?
metadata.Writer: George Waters, Richard Bernstein, Herbert G. Luft
metadata.Actors: Terry Moore, Debra Paget, Bert Freed
